sectionDescription: A selection of projects showcasing my technical skills and creative problem-solving

projects.title: Quartic platform
projects.description: The Quartic Platform is a smart manufacturing platform built for decision intelligence. It unifies manufacturing data at edge and cloud, creates real-time operational context, and powers scalable manufacturing applications that improve operations performance.

projects.title: Tekion Automotive Retail Cloud
projects.description: A seamless, AI-native DMS for modern automotive retailers

projects.title: LifeRamp
projects.description: LifeRamp is a digital coaching and talent development company. We partner with organizations and individuals to deliver transformative outcomes and unlock potential at scale.
